controls.implementation: Quarterly security training via online platform. All employees complete within 30 days of hire. Topics: phishing, password security, data handling.

controls.description: Access to customer data restricted to authorized personnel only
controls.implementation: RBAC via Casbin. Roles: Admin (2), Support (read-only), Engineer (dev/staging), Tenant User (own data). MFA encouraged.

controls.description: Data encrypted in transit and at rest
controls.implementation: TLS 1.3 (transit), AES-256 (at rest on RDS, S3, EBS). AWS KMS for key management with automatic rotation.

controls.description: Systems monitored for performance and availability
controls.implementation: Datadog monitors all services. Alerts: >5% error rate, >3s latency, <99% uptime. 24/7 on-call rotation.

controls.description: Regular backups with tested recovery procedures
controls.implementation: Daily automated backups at 2 AM UTC. 90-day retention. Quarterly recovery tests. Last test: 2025-09-22 (PASSED).
All changes via GitHub PR. Required: code review + CI pass. Prod deploys: CTO approval. Rollback plan required.
Incident response playbook with 4 severity levels (P0-P3). Team defined. Last drill: 2025-08-15 (tabletop exercise).
